definition[0]: used to mean a person, when you do not know or do not say who the person is
example[0]: There’s somebody waiting to see you.
example[1]: Somebody’s car alarm kept me awake all night.
example[2]: If you can’t make it Friday, we can invite somebody else  (=a different person).
example[3]: ‘Who can we get to babysit?’ ‘I’ll call Suzie or somebody.’
example[4]: We need somebody neutral to sort this out.
